name: Blood Dog [DEMO]
description:
Description : 

Blood Dog is a adventure horror game with puzzles and a huge world to explore. You play as a dog whose life ended in the most brutal way possible. Your only goal is to get out of hell and see where Lisa (your trainer) is in the real world.

In this demo you'll have 20 minutes to either explore and solve puzzles or try to finish the demo before time is out! Enjoy.

(By the way if your pc says it's a virus, don't panic, it unfortuantely does that with every Clickteam Fusion 2.5 games, and we hope it will be fixed one day, take care).

[GAME IS UPDATED]

#horror , #adventure , #puzzles
